text: Chantal Cauquil is a French politician, who, from 1999 until 2004, was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) representing France. She was elected as a joint candidate for the Revolutionary Communist League and Workers' Struggle. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:People from Montauban Category:Revolutionary Communist League (France) MEPs Category:Workers' Struggle MEPs Category:MEPs for France 1999–2004
title: Chantal Cauquil
